definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: I would have carried him to the deepest part and dropped him in it.
sentences.chinese: 我會把他背到最深的地方然後把他丟下去。

sentences.english: Drop everything, cross that river, help your brothers.
sentences.chinese: 丟下手上的一切，越過那條河，去幫助我們的兄弟們。

sentences.english: Good mothers, I thought, do not abandon their sick children for work.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲好母親不會丟下生病的孩子去工作。

sentences.english: The boy dropped the apples he had stolen and cut away across the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 那個男孩丟下偷來的蘋果，飛快地穿過果園逃走了。

sentences.english: You will take all of your tequilas along with you, but discard me, will you?
sentences.chinese: 你會把你所有的龍舌蘭帶走，但是丟下我，是嗎？

sentences.english: The others run off in panic, leaving one of their prisoners behind.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的丟下一個俘虜倉惶逃走。

sentences.english: Where do I begin to tell the story of how my mother left me?
sentences.chinese: 我老媽丟下我的事兒該從何說起呢？

sentences.english: Thank each lit the la, not leave all the lonely people.
sentences.chinese: 感謝每一盞亮着的燈，沒有丟下所有孤寂的人。

sentences.english: Several years later, Zhang Kan alas a disease, leaving a hard to make ends meet youngest.
sentences.chinese: 過了幾年，張堪一病嗚呼，丟下一家老小艱辛度日。
我老爸嫌棄我，現在泰勒也丟下了我。

sentences.english: At that time I thought that the father is that cruel-hearted, to work, has thrown down me.
sentences.chinese: 當時我覺得父親是那麼狠心，爲了工作，丟下了我。

sentences.english: The man bunked off and left his wife with three children.
sentences.chinese: 那個男人已離家出走，丟下妻予和三個孩子。

sentences.english: She dropped the water treatment and everything else, and pinned her faith to Pain-killer .
sentences.chinese: 她丟下水療法和別的，一心把希望寄託在這止痛藥上。

sentences.english: So, I under the scorching sun, leaving the children fever is conducting home visits.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我頂着烈日，丟下正感冒發燒的孩子進行家訪。

sentences.english: If an aircraft drops a high-explosive bomb on a ship, it won't be as effective.
sentences.chinese: 如果飛機丟下高爆炸彈在一艘船上，它將不如此有效。
